content:
Coach Patrick Chambers yells at his players during the mens basketball game against Maryland at the Bryce Jordan Center on Tuesday Feb PERIOD   PERIOD Penn State defeated Maryland  PERIOD

When Penn State takes the court for the first time this season on Nov PERIOD  four new freshmen faces will be with the team PERIOD

Helping coach Pat Chambers lead these newcomers will be the coaching staffs own fresh face  Jim Ferry PERIOD

Ferry who has spent  years as a head coach enters the Penn State program after a fiveyear stint at Duquesne PERIOD His time with the Dukes ended this past March when his team finished  on the season PERIOD

Despite his recent struggles at Duquesne Ferry brings a vast offensive knowledge and experience of turning an abysmal LIUBrooklyn program into a frequent NCAA Tournament invitee PERIOD

His experience  years experience as a head coach its been great to have him in the office Chambers said PERIOD Its great for our staff its great for the players PERIOD You can really tap into him. during his tenure at Long Island Ferry transformed a fivewin team from the year before his arrival in  into two Northeastern Conference regular season and tournament titles He was also twice named the NEC Coach of the Year in  and  PERIOD

His LIU coaching career reached its pinnacle in  and  when Ferry twice led the school to the NCAA Tournament as a 16seed PERIOD

Josh Reaves  reacts after a call is made in Penn States favor during the mens basketball game against Purdue PERIOD After heading to overtime the Nittany Lions lost  at the Bryce Jordan Center on Tuesday Feb PERIOD   PERIOD

Ferrys offensive expertise was the key ingredient to success for the Blackbirds PERIOD In  LIU was the fourthhighest scoring team and played at the thirdfastest tempo in the country PERIOD That was outpaced the following season as Ferrys Blackbirds ran the secondquickest tempo offense in the country averaging . points per game also second most in the country PERIOD

He has a very good offensive background Chambers said PERIOD He likes a lot of the sets that were running PERIOD We just have to make some little tweaks here and there and dedicate a little more time on certain days than others. ferrys reputation as an excellent recruiter also bodes well for the Nittany Lions PERIOD

An Elmont New York native Ferry brings the potential of expanding Penn States recruiting pipeline into the basketball talentrich state PERIOD

Ferry already proved his recruiting chops this summer as freshman guard Jamari Wheeler originally a Duquesne commit under Ferrys staff announced his new commitment to lace up for Chambers and Ferry at Penn State PERIOD

When it comes to recruiting or community or fundraising anything that has to deal with a program its been great to have Ferry a part of it Chambers said PERIOD The experience has just been really good for me as the head coach to be able to lean on someone like that. rELATED CONTENT
